name: Slow Mustache
description:
Can you survive 10 floor only with slow and fast motion powers ?

Slow Mustache is a 2.5D action-platformer in which you need to escape 10 floors using slow and fast motion powers, can you do it ?

you can play this game for free but any donations would be appreciated !
